name: Cheddar and Spinach Scramble
instructions:
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, whole milk, and a pinch of salt.
In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat, then add spinach and cook until wilted.
Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and scramble until just set.
Stir in shredded cheddar cheese until melted.

name: Cheesy Spinach and Bacon Frittata
instructions:
Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a skillet, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove and chop into pieces, leaving the fat in the pan.
Add spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Combine the spinach and bacon with the egg mixture and pour into the skillet. Sprinkle cheese on top.
Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for about 20 minutes or until the frittata is set.

name: Creamy Spinach and Chicken Pasta
instructions:
Cook pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
In a skillet, melt the butter and cook sliced chicken breasts until no longer pink.
Add the spinach and stir until wilted, then mix in the pasta sauce and milk.
Combine the pasta with the sauce mixture and top with cheddar cheese.
Cover and let simmer on low heat for 5 minutes until cheese is melted.
